featuredprojects.title: Connectify
featuredprojects.description: Your personal space to share moments, chat in real-time, and build your own community — simple, secure, and clutter-free.
featuredprojects.fullDescription: Connectify is a full-stack social media web application that allows users to connect, share, and communicate in real-time. Designed with a focus on simplicity, security, and community building, Connectify offers a seamless experience for posting updates, chatting instantly, and growing your social network in a clutter-free interface.

featuredprojects.title: Jeet's Market
featuredprojects.description: Discover quality products at great prices — fast shipping, secure checkout, and a seamless shopping experience.
featuredprojects.fullDescription: Jeet's Market is a complete MERN-stack e-commerce platform offering users a modern, intuitive online shopping experience. From browsing quality products to secure checkout and fast delivery, every aspect is built to ensure performance, usability, and reliability.

featuredprojects.title: RateMe
featuredprojects.description: Enhance your singing with advanced vocal techniques for intermediate to advanced learners.
